generations.inputText:
Write an ad for QOOLA, which is a wearable air conditioner with Ion Purifier

Product: QOOLA Portable Air Conditioner can be used for air conditioning or heating. The premium stainless steel plate on the unit can bring a cool or warm sensation to your body instantly. It can dissipate cooling for users in hot weather and generate heating in cold weather. It is suitable in both Winter and Summer.
QOOLA comes with 4 cooling and heating modes, the temperatures can drop down to the lowest at 15°C and the highest at 45°C, which means you can easily adjust to your desired temperature anytime. That being said you can use it throughout four seasons! 
Negative Air Ions can remove contaminants such as micro dust, pollens, and other contaminating particles anywhere. QOOLA generates ions to remove residual contaminants to create fresh air directly.

Tone: informative, comical

Audience: college students

Must Include: Lowest Temp, Highest Temp

text: Are you looking for an air conditioner that can do more than just cool you down? QOOLA has you covered! Not only is this portable air conditioner perfect for cooling down in the summer, but it can also be used to generate heat in the winter.
